amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary of Defense to evaluate the cost of different types of energy and purchase the most cost effective option available.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-571 to require the DOD to evaluate the cost of different types of energy and purchase the most cost effective option available.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 266 (Roll no. 208).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 266 (Roll no. 208).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Buck.
